content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various shell commands, but received error messages indicating that the necessary files were not found. I tried multiple variations of the command, including changing the path and using different conda activation commands, but none were successful. The error message consistently indicated that the conda.sh file was not found. In response to my latest action, I received an error message indicating that the conda.sh file was not found in any of the specified directories.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /home/atlas/anaconda3/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && echo \\"Environment activated.\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /home/atlas/anaconda3/bin/activate: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
